name: CHASE (itch) (~vidak)
description:
The game is turn based. To move, use the numbers surrounding [5] on your keyboard Numpad as if they were direction arrows:

[8] is UP, [2] is DOWN, [4] is LEFT, [6] is RIGHT.

[5] is NO MOVE (as in, waste a turn). [0] forfeits the game.

Press [RETURN] after typing a number in order to read it into the REPL.

I have not yet added diagonal movement into the game.
